short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension sends you a notification when you touch your face to help prevent the spread of bacteria and viruses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
STOP Touching Your Face is an open-source Chrome extension that uses your webcam and tensorflow.js to send you a notification when you touch your face. In doing so, your webcam images are processed locally on your machine and at no time is any information collected or sent externally.

üöÄ Features:
     ü§ö Image classifier to detect if a user is touching their face
     üîî Snooze notification allows you to set a minimum time required before the app can send another notification when touching your face
     üîã Low power mode activates when the webcam is off allowing for notifications to be sent out periodically

üöÄ What's Next:
    ‚≠êÔ∏è Improved image classifier
    ‚≠êÔ∏è Apple Watch version of STOP Touching Your Face
